AUTHOR: Alzarath
DESCRIPTION:
Usage: [p]pony [text...] to get the first result
Usage: [p]ponyr [text...] to get a random result

Search http://derpiboo.ru/ for pony pictures.
Usage: [p]ponyfilter can be used to list Derpibooru filters, set the filter as a server owner, and add and delete filters as a bot owner. and

Disclaimer: By default this cog does not display NSFW content, but it is able to through setting filters.
NAME: Searches for and posts ponies
